title: (14075.09092020.173000270) FR2.0
abstract: TWO LINES OF INTERVENTION: 1) INVESTMENTS IN BI FOR E-MARKETING AND E-COMMERCE DEVELOPMENT; 2) REALISATION OF A VERTICAL INTEGRATION TO OPTIMISE THE EXPLOITATION OF INFORMATION FLOWS

motivations: There is a need to optimize e-marketing and e-commerce development through business intelligence (BI) investments.
Inefficient exploitation of information flows requires a solution to improve overall performance.
objectives: Enhance e-marketing and e-commerce capabilities through strategic investments in business intelligence.
Achieve vertical integration to optimize the utilization of information flows.
methods: Implement business intelligence solutions to support e-marketing and e-commerce development.
Realize vertical integration to streamline information flow exploitation.
llama_json.research_subject: Optimization of e-marketing, e-commerce, and information flow exploitation through business intelligence and vertical integration

motivations: There is a need for investments in Business Intelligence (BI) to enhance e-marketing and e-commerce development.
Optimization of information flows through vertical integration is required.
objectives: Invest in Business Intelligence for the development of e-marketing and e-commerce.
Achieve vertical integration to optimize the exploitation of information flows.
openai_json.research_subject: Investments in Business Intelligence for e-marketing and e-commerce development and vertical integration for information flow optimization

motivations: There is a need to enhance e-marketing and e-commerce capabilities through better data utilization and business intelligence.
Organizations require improved integration systems to optimize the exploitation of information flows across different business processes.
objectives: Develop and implement business intelligence investments to strengthen e-marketing and e-commerce development.
Achieve vertical integration to optimize the exploitation and management of information flows.
methods: Implement business intelligence systems and tools for e-marketing and e-commerce applications.
Develop vertical integration strategies to streamline information flow processes.
results: Enhanced e-marketing and e-commerce capabilities through improved business intelligence infrastructure.
Optimized information flow management through successful vertical integration implementation.
anthropic_json.research_subject: Business intelligence implementation for e-commerce and vertical integration of information flows
